title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split Maxi

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the denim dress well-made, comfortable, and appreciate its nice weight and real denim material. They like its style, with one customer noting its loose boho look, and consider it versatile, with one mentioning it's perfect for running errands. The length receives mixed feedback - while some say it hits mid-calf, others note it's not long enough to qualify as a maxi. The sizing is also mixed, with some finding it excellent while others say it's very large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute denim dress!
items.body: Very cute denim dress. It is oversized but made to be that way. Order your usual size (small is my regular size). Adorable with boots/sneakers. Love the snaps and rolled up sleeves! Very comfy and perfect weight of denim. Read more
items.author: Dana hutchison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Comfortable
items.body: A heavier weight than I expected but, after a wash, softer and comfortable. Well made. Love the midi length. Will go nicely with boots this fall and winter. Excellent fit, flattering. Look Can be changed up with scarf or belt. Read more
items.author: GertsGirl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavier than expected
items.body: I am 5’4 and 153 pounds. Ordered a Medium and it is correct size. The dress is heavier in weight than I expected. The pockets are a good sized but I didn’t think my phone would stay put. The snaps are bigger, heavier and bulkier than I like. However, I put it on and wore around the house and fell for it as it’s roomy and comfortable. It is a lot of dress to pull up over your head as you take it off and I found that annoying. I haven’t washed it but am skeptical as in description it says to hang dry. Whoever hangs their denim? I didn’t notice the instruction when I ordered. We’ll see how it goes. Read more
items.author: Lee

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, misleading length.
items.body: Good material. Very stylish. But definitely not a maxi length dress. At best a t-legnth dress which was disappointing because the advertised look is what I was going for. I am 5'3" and the splits are at the bend of my knees. But the quality is nice so I will keep it. Read more
items.author: Christine Jackson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SIZE DOWN ON THIS DRESS
items.body: I really love this dress. It is roomy with large pockets to place my cell phone. The material is good quality and I like the style. (BUT) I am 5'5", a 40DDD bust ,180 lbs. and a EXTRA LARGE was too large. I reordered a size LARGE and I still have some in the dress, but it fits just the way I like it. I didn't return the EXTRA LARGE so I don't know what the return policy is. I am giving the EXTRA LARGE to someone I know. I think this is a nice dress for the Fall and Winter weather. Read more
items.author: Cindoria V. Briscoe

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars No! Just no!
items.body: I am 5'8" and it hit me just below the knee, definitely not long like shown. Because it was short, the pockets were up higher than they should have been. The collar was another story. It was large and awkward. It looked like it belonged on a men's size 3xl shirt (the dress was an XL). It immediately went back. Read more
items.author: Kim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute denim maxi
items.body: Super cute long denim dress! This is a good looking and nicely made dress. The fabric weight is very nice - not lightweight but not stiff. I am not quite 5' 4" tall and this comes to my ankles - a great length to wear with boots. It washes nicely, too. Read more
items.author: T. Tomp

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect loose fit!
items.body: Perfect! I love it! I am 5'8" and medium frame. This dress hit mid calf, and well made.Would love in a different color! Read more
items.author: BlueWaters

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z-dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
